messages.subject: Computer games the kids found
messages.msgSnippet: The older boy got this website: http://crazymonkeygames.com some games are cool especially the one called star collision you are a  planet and have to
messages.messageBody:
The older boy got this website: http://crazymonkeygames.com

some games are cool especially the one called 'star collision' you are
a planet and have to 'swallow' smaller planets but avoid bigger
planets that can swallow YOU. I think this is an hiliarious way to
learn the laws of gravity in the outer space.
